attributes.action: All Foreigners to Pay for the use of any NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All foreigners should pay for any use of our hosptials, dentists etc...we should all carry NHS cards to prove we are legible to use the NHS and stop foreigners coming into this country and receiving medical attention on be half of this country...let them show passports etc...they arent British they pay before treatment commences...then hopefully we will have more money in the NHS to help the eldery etc...our country comes first

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
